descriptionHtml:
Gives Khajiits two extra, passive, race bonuses: Feline Agility and Feline Reflexes. And increases their stamina regen by 1.

Feline Agility makes them walk and run noticeably faster, and jump a bit higher.
Feline Reflexes raises attack speed.

Install: Extract and pick the file you want, move to Skyrim\Data folder
Uninstall: Remove from Skyrim\Data folder
If speeds do not return to normal after removing files, open console and type:
player.setav weaponspeedmult .83
(untested by me, I've had no problems, but I believe it should work :) )

Inspired by greysinsanderson wondering how to do this.
author: deadxpixels
